mapper.insert: insert into carseries (seriesid, seriesimg, seriesbrand, seriesname, seriesengname, seriestype, seriesremark, seriesstatus) values (#{seriesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seriesimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seriesbrand,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seriesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seriesengname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{seriestype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seriesremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seriesstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update carseries set seriesimg = #{seriesimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seriesbrand = #{seriesbrand,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seriesname = #{seriesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seriesengname = #{seriesengname,jdbcType=CHAR}, seriestype = #{seriestype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seriesremark = #{seriesremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seriesstatus = #{seriesstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where seriesid = #{seriesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select seriesid, seriesimg, seriesbrand, seriesname, seriesengname, seriestype, seriesremark, seriesstatus from carseries where seriesid = #{seriesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select seriesid, seriesimg, seriesbrand, seriesname, seriesengname, seriestype, seriesremark, seriesstatus from carseries
